reviews.review: Skills required to be an excellent player, this is why CS is one of the best game since those last 15 years

Прошло 20 лет с CS 1,6...
Может быть добавим новые режимы? Неее
Добавим новые карты? Да нууу
Новый геймплей? Уууу
Новый движок? Неет
А МОЖЕТ НОВЫЕ КЕЙСЫ?!!... О ДА!

lowkey wasted 277 hours and probably more on this piece of dudu game but whatever

Maybe this was meant to be a different type of Counter Strike, but I have seriously doubt I will enjoy it as much as I enjoyed playing CS source. The gameplay is much smoother, pinpointing players with great accuracy because of better sound, I can actually see player models on my screen, and talent and experience actually still show. If I could ask for a refund on this game I would, especially being such a long time loyal customer. I'm very disappointed.
